abstract.para: You can customize the standard &sle; installation images by editing a file in the installation ISO image, media.1/products. Add modules and extensions to create a single customized installation image. Then copy your custom image to a CD, DVD, or &usbflashdrive; to create a customized bootable installation medium. See the &suse; Best Practices paper on How to Create a Custom Installation Medium for SUSE Linux Enterprise 15 for complete instructions.
